name: Ancient Manuscript
description: Contains lore and hints about the Tower.

name: Relic Fragment
description: A piece of a relic with historical significance.

name: Forgotten Coin
description: An ancient coin embossed with the visage of a long-forgotten ruler. It is said to bring fortune—or curse—to its discoverer.

name: Mystic Locket
description: A delicate locket that holds a mysterious aura. Theres a portrait inside of a small girl in a red frilly dress and a noble woman in a nightgown.

name: Rune-Etched Tablet
description: A stone tablet carved with archaic runes. Scholars believe it holds clues to the ancient magic of the Tower.

name: Tattered Banner
description: A faded banner from a lost kingdom, its worn fabric and symbols evoking memories of former glory.
